def word_array_filter(s, target):
    s = s.replace('', ' ')
    words = s.split(' ')
    filtered_words = [word for word in words if word != target]
    return filtered_words

def word_array_filter(s, target):
    s = s.replace(', ', '')
    words = s.split(' ')
    filtered_words = [word for word in words if word != target]
    return filtered_words

mutants.original_line: filtered_words = [word for word in words if word != target]

mutants.code:
def word_array_filter(s, target):
    s = s.replace(', ', ' ')
    words = s.split(' ')
    filtered_words = [word for word in words if word == target]
    return filtered_words
